'''Selinia''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|Sun-blistered and rawboned, the pirate regards you both with a discerning glare. She tongues a chapped bottom lip but keeps quiet.}}

Selinia is a victim of much verbal abuse at the hands of Captain Furrante, perhaps for the fact that she survived where others did not, taking a cudgel to the head and waking up to see the ship's steward consumed by the undead of the ''Floating Hangman'' that attacked her ship in open seas. She witnessed the head of the undead, however, former Darcozzi Paladin [Lucia Rivan](/luciaRivan/), and the method of attack they use: A magical mist conjured on the open seas, from which the monstrous ship attacks.

}}

## =Quests

=
* [Symbols of Death](/symbolsOfDeath/): She's the only survivor of a crew slaughtered by the ghostly galleon. You can be kind of her, which is a surprise to everyone.

[Category:Dunnage characters](/categoryDunnageCharacters/)

==Background==
{{Description|Sun-blistered and rawboned, the pirate regards you both with a discerning glare. She tongues a chapped bottom lip but keeps quiet.}}

Selinia is a victim of much verbal abuse at the hands of Captain Furrante, perhaps for the fact that she survived where others did not, taking a cudgel to the head and waking up to see the ship's steward consumed by the undead of the ''Floating Hangman'' that attacked her ship in open seas.
